channel.title: I use aryan on proxy will playing runescape. safe?
channel.description: i use aryan to auto on 4 accounts, bitch miners, choppers ext. my question is if i use a proxy on the aryan bots my main cant get banned correct? because i play on him will the bots are running

item.title: I use aryan on proxy will playing runescape. safe?
item.dc:creator: @muerte4 muerte4
item.description:
@muerte4 wrote:

as long as you never the same ip with your main and your bots u should be fine. Someone suggested to me a good of way trading with your bots, make them attack something they can’t kill once they die collect your reward

Read full topic

item.source: I use aryan on proxy will playing runescape. safe?

item.title: I use aryan on proxy will playing runescape. safe?
item.dc:creator: @freeza freeza
item.description:
@freeza wrote:

in theory your fine but dont hold me to that as i dont know everything…iam a noob around these parts to
but one thing i can say is dont ever trade to your main some people have a mule they trade to then to there main but i dont advise that either as some of my friends have been banned that way.
my current method of trading my goods to my main is find a empty house drop all the stuff on the ground have my bot walk away and my main pick it up…sorry if i couldnt help you more

warning!!! iam not saying this wont get u banned but for me this seams to be the safest method i have come up with.

Read full topic
